title: Korean Farmer on Japanese Name Q3

content.question: A historian would most likely use the passage to research which of the following?

choices.label: The spread of languages and culture by migrants living in ethnic enclaves in the receiving country
The use of nonviolent resistance methods against governments that demand cultural assimilation
The tactics used by authoritarian regimes to create economic self-sufficiency
The emergence of movements protesting the consequences of economic and cultural globalization

content.answer: The use of nonviolent resistance methods against governments that demand cultural assimilation

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
